评论概述: Beautiful dress in my favorite color
评论详情: “Lovely dress! The material is comfortable, and the fit is perfect. Great for any occasion.”

评论概述: I absolutely love this dress! Belt is adorable and removable.
评论详情: I can't say enough good things about this dress, it's gorgeous! I love that it has a collar and the buttons are real, so you can adjust, as needed. There is a slip under the dress, so you don't have to worry about showing anything you don't want to. The skirt features beautiful pleating that hangs perfectly. I'm 5ft and about 120 lbs. I generally wear a size S, that's what I ordered and it fits great. The sleeves, I do have to roll up but that's to be expected with nearly everything I buy and is an easy fix. There is a button closure at the wrist, which helps. I ordered in Navy Blue and it is exactly as shown, a true Navy color. I love that this comes with a cute belt that you can take off. I've worn that belt with this dress, as well as other pants/outfits. I'd say this dress is a great deal and high quality, too! It has held up through many washes. I've opted to put this in a garment bag when I wash it and have hung to dry. That's worked perfectly! Would highly recommend this dress to anyone.

评论概述: I felt beautiful in this dress.
评论详情: This dress is flattering and comfortable to wear and has become a “go to” dress choice for me. I highly recommend it. The fit is true to size. (I normally wear a medium & purchased a medium.)

I bought this dress for nursing as it is button down. You do need a cami under it as the top is quite sheer, but I was able to find nursing campus. It fits really well and is comfortable while looking classy. It's not super cheap, but you get the quality you pay for. It washes well and doesn't wear or fade after multiple washes.

I won’t be able to wear this dress again.  Save your money, don’t buy unless you need for a one time event or your like throwing money away at the end of the day. .

I’m 5’6” 175lbs pear shape. Amazon recommended a large but I dislike tight clothes so I went up to XL. Dress fit snug but not too tight. The dress feels just right. Would order again. Hopefully this review will help others, I know I depend on reviews to help me choose my Amazon clothes/purchases.

评论概述: Beware that someone may have worn the dress and returned it.
评论详情: I bought my mother a dress for when she was to be released from hospitalization.  It took longer than anticipated and I opened the dress bag today to get it cleaned for her to wear.  Upon opening the plastic bag, the dress had a distinct odor of perfume, the bust was closed with a large safety pin, though the belt was in the original plastic bag.  The dress is cute, not expensive, but I am very disappointed that it was never checked over in the Returns Department for safety pins, perfume odor, etc.  I will not be giving this dress to my mother.  It was my fault that I did not open it before the window of return closed.  Now I know better.

评论概述: A really decent dress, especially by Amazon standards
评论详情: Let’s face it, clothes off Amazon aren’t exactly known for their “quality.” But this dress has a nice thick fabric with a sewn in slip underneath that goes the whole length of the skirt. It’s not sheer on the skirt. The buttons are decent but the top can split open between the buttons if you are a little more well endowed. A little fabric tape did the trick for me. The belt is heinous but is easily replaceable.  A very nice dress for the price.
I was very anxious to receive this dress. It looks exactly as pictured. However, they sent a size smaller, and they sent it without the belt. Had to return it.
Dress did not come with a belt. Will be returning it to get one with belt.

I purchased this dress for an event that required a Lilac dress.  I bought it without giving it a lot of thought, it was the right color and the price was right.  To my surprise, I got many compliments and it fit just perfect.  I bragged about finding it on Amazon and while this is not my style of dresses it actually looked really good on me, I'm thinking of getting more colors.  The fit is on point, the length is perfect with heels, the top may seem see through but it's not.
This dress is perfect with a blazer. It has a great length and flows beautifully when walking. It runs a bit small at the waist, though. Go up one size so you have some wiggle room with the belt.
